concept.title: Export data
concept.shortdesc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

conbody.p: To download resource data as a .csv file, click Export. The filename is <ui_page>_<timestamp>.csv, for example pd_export_nodes_2019-06-17_1054.csv.
